features.title: Unified Dashboard Insights
features.user_story: As an operations lead, I want to view key performance indicators on the dashboard so that I can track account health in real time.

acceptance_criteria.behavior: Dashboard loads KPIs together on first paint.
acceptance_criteria.validation: Verify selectors/index.json renders metric-header, revenue widget, uptime panel without missing nodes.

acceptance_criteria.behavior: Refresh toast appears when metrics flag stale data.
acceptance_criteria.validation: Simulate stale dataset and assert toast with Retry CTA using dashboard_observations.txt.

features.notes: Clarified uptime messaging with SLA note from critique loop.

features.title: Guided Login Experience
features.user_story: As a returning user, I want guided prompts through the login form so that I can authenticate quickly without errors.

acceptance_criteria.behavior: Inline validation appears under missing credentials.
acceptance_criteria.validation: Use selectors/home_dom_snapshot.txt to assert inline error nodes attach to the empty field.

acceptance_criteria.behavior: Successful login persists session token and redirects to dashboard.
acceptance_criteria.validation: Replay login flow and confirm dashboard route event in generated test suite.

features.notes: Added post-login redirect coverage and session persistence requirement.

features.title: Scenario Authoring Workspace
features.user_story: As a QA engineer, I want to export synthesized user stories with acceptance criteria so that I can hand off executable tests to automation immediately.

acceptance_criteria.behavior: Synthesis outputs structured JSON entries for every feature cluster.
acceptance_criteria.validation: Verify frd/stories_export.json includes one entry per story with non-empty acceptance_criteria.

acceptance_criteria.behavior: Quality review flags and repairs ambiguous stories before export.
acceptance_criteria.validation: Ensure quality_score >= 0.8 for all stories and review feedback is stored in logs/story_quality_review.log.

features.notes: Ensured metadata completeness and critique loop attachments.
